name: saint
text: i am amazed by how many people lame you. i hope crickets sound like the click of their mouse unrightfully laming commentors.

name: waldo913
text:
Since I can't reply directly to asherdan, I'll do it here. Hope that's okay.

asherdan: I'm sorry everyone hates you.
I don't hate you.

I'm awarding saint a posthumous chubbie in your honor.

name: slalvation
text: You could reply to him and also give him the chubby yourself if you changed your comment filtering, unless there is a different reason you cannot.

name: waldo913
text: Sure, but then I wouldn't have been able to use the word 'posthumous' in the wrong context.  Oh wait, I guess I could do that anytime, couldn't I?

name: presterjohn
text: 'herdan needs to stop 'postrophizing 'very damn name 'rites.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, mikeronomicon, Thorfinn, wildcat, DiamondMonster, HSE, atticusonline, Talbain, deovalente, Epicurus, littlefatdog, Pigs)

name: soticoto
text: Random, arbitrary Chubb for the Dan.

name: woodenteeth
text: oh god. i gave asherdan a chubby because of manflesh. you - you're a hero now.

name: soticoto
text: What the hell happened to Dr Manflesh's comments anyway? I haven't seen any of them so far, and I'm sure he'd made some by this point... They MADE Assetbar!

name: woodenteeth
text: Not sure. You may have him on auto-ignore. Which isn't your fault. It's OK man. It's OK.

name: soticoto
text:
... And would you have any clue how to undo such a thing?
Does it make a difference that I saw a short remark of his a while ago, so presumably I don't have the guy himself on complete ignore?

Either way, his absence makes me sad. =(

name: woodenteeth
text: Ignore List. It's up in the top right corner. Click there and you shall find he.

name: soticoto
text:
Left. I searched the right futiley for a while until it occurred to me to check the left.
Anyhow... the guy's name isn't on the list. There were some rather funny names though.

name: soticoto
text: And why didn't you mention that the text in the ignore list page is comedy gold? Hidden Onstad magic?! I'd 5 it if I could!

name: woodenteeth
text:
Oh shit. Yes. Left. I'm in Australia you know, so it's my Right, your Left.

You'll have to 5 AIU as most of those name's are his.

text: "herdan" however, makes you sound like some kind of pimp.

text: or a female version of Dan.  There's Dan, then there's Her-Dan.

name: deovalente
text: Funny, I had just read asherdan's comment and was thinking just that.  Then I scrolled down and saw this.  Chubby!

name: tripperday
text:
C'mon. He said the Einstein wig eclipsed the dialogue. That's an incredibly lame thing to say because it isn't true.

It's okay to not understand art or words as long you don't try to be a critic.

name: i_love_kate
text: (I am pretty sure he did not mean "eclipse" in a literal sense.)

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Homepie, mercuri0us, lordparadise)

name: omega
text: Y'know what's funny? I've read the entire archives through, the day somebody recommended Achewood to me. Then, I noticed there were comments, and I read those through. I've come to see a strange, polarizing trend: the swing of Asherdan's popularity. For a while, I thought he was the most horrible guy ever- but then, this happened. Why? What's going on? I haven't seen a change in his style of writing, or the content therein. In fact, it doesn't seem as if he, himself, cares that there is a change, he keeps on doing his own damn thing. I'm halfway through my assetbar trawl, so I have a feeling that opinions will swing in ways unpredicted from here on out... I'll check back in a month to make sure that I've been lamed out of continuity for posting this at the very top, as an assurance that things are still the way they are supposed to be. Cheers!

name: chaesar
text: A comment left by chaesar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt, _cheesekayke, wehavemagnums)

text:

name: sargasm
text: The centerpiece of this strip is the "his hand is clear" comment.  Einstein cannot write, because his hand is clear (from being a ghost).

text: Yes.

name: unsentletter

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Beef is always makin' Ray feel guilty about thinking stuff is rad. Alcoholism, war atrocities, and so forth.

name: thommy_h
text:
You'd thing for a guy who knows his science, Beef would be a bit more impartial about Einstein's contributions to physics - it's not like doing the research that leads to a certain invention is morally equivelant to being responsible for the deaths caused by that invention.

I guess Beef just thinks that way though. You can't expect someone who has such as depression to really be an expert on ethics like that. He sees the worst in everyone.

name: sargasm
text: I dunno, it seems like Beef is a guy who can't sharpen a pencil without faintly hearing the screams of someone getting stabbed by it.

name: stuart
text: Alt text: Oh who is Beef kidding that is what all the crickets in the night sound like to him anyway

name: gouldgonewild
text: Beef is just trying to get his boy Ray to wise up and stop channeling.
